dct_title_s: A combined view of the principal mountains & rivers in the world : accompanied by a table shewing their relative heights & lengt
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:24,000. Relief shown by hachures, spot heights, and pictorially. Hand? colored. Includes text and indexed statistical tables. Dimensions: 1 map : color, on cloth ; 41 x 59 cm, bound in cover 21 x 15 cm
